bpi.most.client.rpc

Interface DatapointService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

    @RemoteServiceRelativePath(value="services/gwtrpc/dp")
public interface DatapointService
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

      • getDataPeriodic

        bpi.most.shared.DpDataset getDataPeriodic(java.lang.String datapointName,
                                        java.util.Date starttime,
                                        java.util.Date endtime,
                                        java.lang.Float period)
        A method used to get data between a start and end time with a specific period. This can be useful if the normal amount of data you get with the selected start and end time is too much.
        Parameters:
        datapointName - The name of the data point you want the data from.
        starttime - Start time of the period you want the data.
        endtime - End time of the period you want the data.
        period - The period in seconds, with which you want the data.
        Returns:
        Returns a DpDataset with the values between start and end time with the selected period.

      • getNumberOfValues

        java.lang.Integer getNumberOfValues(java.lang.String datapointName,
                                  java.util.Date starttime,
                                  java.util.Date endtime)
        A method used to get the number of values in a specific time frame.
        Parameters:
        datapointName - The name of the data point you want the data from.
        starttime - Start time of the time frame you want to know how many values are in.
        endtime - End time of the time frame you want to know how many values are in.
        Returns:
        Number of values in the specific time frame between start and end time.
